name: Aurnhammer, LLC
overview:
Aurnhammer LLC is a creative media, custom design and development agency specializing in branded smart device applications for the mobile space. Located in Lower Manhattan, the company prides itself on being born, bred, and operated solely in New York City. Besides technological skill in coding and programming, Aurnhammer team players bring experience in the fields of film and television production, digital arts, and graphic design. At the company’s core is a solid team of strategists, designers and programmers who work in a variety technologies and platforms to flawlessly bring these ideas to life.

For businesses today, presence in the ever expanding universe of mobile smart device technology has become a necessity, rather than a luxury. 91% of the top 100 brands in the world now have a presence in at least one of the major mobile applications stores. Savvy iPhone and Android users have come to expect apps that entertain or provide a useful service from the companies that they patronize. This captive audience is a prime opportunity for advertising, marketing, and brand recognition.

providerships.title: PR, AR and Social Media Marketing
